title: YAML Application Description
description: An AICA application graph description using YAML syntax.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: The schema version of the application syntax

dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.description: The application dependencies, including the version of AICA Core and any required packages

core.title: Core Version
core.description: The version of the AICA Core image

packages.title: Application Packages
packages.description: A list of packages required by the application

items.title: Package Details
items.description: The specification of a package name and version with optional version constraints

version.title: Package Version
version.description: The specific version of the package used by the author of the application

constraints.title: Package Version Constraint
constraints.description: A range of acceptable package versions that are supported by the application defined by constraints. For more details on syntax, see https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/expressions/version-constraints

metadata.title: Application Metadata
metadata.description: Metadata used to describe the application for user convenience. This information may be used by parsers to search or sort database applications

description.title: Application Description
description.description: A brief description of the application

tags.title: Application Tags
tags.description: A collection of user-defined tags that provide additional context for categorizing the application

userdata.title: User Data
userdata.description: This property accepts any data structure and will be ignored by the syntax parser. It can be used to store additional metadata or context about the application for user convenience.

on_start.title: On Start
on_start.description: A special keyword that triggers events when the application is launched

hardware.title: Hardware Interfaces
hardware.description: A description of hardware interfaces used in the application

urdf.title: URDF
urdf.description: The path to the URDF file of the hardware

rate.description: The rate in Hz at which to run the hardware interface

strict.title: Strict Hardware
strict.description: If true, automatically stop controller execution on error or if the execution rate drops below the rate tolerance threshold

rate_tolerance.title: Rate Tolerance
rate_tolerance.description: The tolerance threshold relative to the rate that determines the minimum acceptable execution rate as (rate * rate_tolerance) before triggering the "on_rate_violation" event transition

^[a-z][a-z0-9_]*[a-z0-9]$.title: Hardware Parameter
^[a-z][a-z0-9_]*[a-z0-9]$.description: A hardware parameter in the URDF to be overridden with a new value

display_name.title: Hardware Display Name
display_name.description: The human-readable name to display on the hardware interface

events.title: Hardware Events
events.description: Hardware event sources that can trigger events

transitions.title: Hardware State Transitions
transitions.description: Hardware state transitions that can trigger events

controllers.title: Controllers
controllers.description: The controllers attached to the hardware interface

display_name.title: Controller Display Name
display_name.description: The human-readable name to display on the controller

plugin.title: Controller Plugin
plugin.description: The name of the controller plugin

rate.description: The rate in Hz at which to run the controller. If undefined, the hardware rate is used instead.

events.title: Controller Events
events.description: Controller event sources that can trigger events

transitions.title: Controller State Transitions
transitions.description: Controller state transitions that can trigger events

predicates.title: Controller Predicates
predicates.description: Controller predicates that can trigger events

components.title: Components
components.description: A description of components used in the application

display_name.title: Component Display Name
display_name.description: The human-readable name to display on the component

component.title: Component Registration
component.description: The fully qualified class name used to register the component

remapping.title: Component Remapping
remapping.description: The remapping rules for the component node name and namespace

name.title: Node Name
name.description: The remapping rules for the component node name

namespace.title: Node Namespace
namespace.description: The remapping rules for the component node namespace

rate.description: The rate in Hz at which to run the component's periodic behaviors

input_collections.title: Input collections
input_collections.description: Collections of input signals of the component

^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.title: Input topics
^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.description: The array of topics that are included in the signal collection

events.title: Component Events
events.description: Component event sources that can trigger events

transitions.title: Component State Transitions
transitions.description: Component state transitions that can trigger events

predicates.title: Component Predicates
predicates.description: Component predicates that can trigger events

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: A description of logical conditions used to trigger events in the application

display_name.title: Condition Display Name
display_name.description: The human-readable name to display on the condition

oneOf.title: Condition Object
oneOf.description: A specific condition source in the application

component_predicate.title: Component Predicate Condition
component_predicate.description: A condition depending on the runtime state of a component predicate

controller_predicate.title: Controller Predicate Condition
controller_predicate.description: A condition depending on the runtime state of a controller predicate

component_state.title: Component State Condition
component_state.description: A condition depending on the runtime state of a component

state.title: Component State
state.description: The runtime state of the component

controller_state.title: Controller State Condition
controller_state.description: A condition depending on the runtime state of a controller

state.title: Controller State
state.description: The runtime state of the controller

hardware_state.title: Hardware State Condition
hardware_state.description: A condition depending on the runtime state of a hardware interface

state.title: Hardware State
state.description: The runtime state of the hardware interface

sequence_state.title: Sequence State Condition
sequence_state.description: A condition depending on the runtime state of a sequence

state.title: Sequence State
state.description: The runtime state of the sequence

condition.title: Reference Condition
condition.description: A condition depending on the runtime state of another condition

boolean.description: A hard-coded Boolean value which may be useful for testing and developing applications

all.title: All
all.description: True only when every listed item is true

any.title: Any
any.description: True if at least one of the listed items is true

one_of.title: One Of
one_of.description: True only when exactly one of the listed items is true

not.title: Not
not.description: True only when the sub-item is false

sequences.title: Sequences
sequences.description: A description of sequences used to trigger events in a specific order

display_name.title: Sequence Display Name
display_name.description: The human-readable name to display on the sequence

loop.title: Loop Sequence
loop.description: If true, automatically restart the sequence after completing the last sequence step

steps.title: Sequence Steps
steps.description: The ordered sequence steps to either trigger events, wait for a predefined time or check a condition

anyOf.title: Delay Step
anyOf.description: Delay the sequence by a defined time in seconds

delay.description: The time to delay the sequence in seconds

anyOf.title: Check Condition Step
anyOf.description: Check a runtime condition to determine if the sequence should continue or not

frames.title: Frames
frames.description: A description of the static frames available in the application

^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.title: Frame
^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.description: The position and orientation of a static frame in the application

position.title: Frame Position
position.description: The frame position as Cartesian coordinates

orientation.title: Frame Orientation
orientation.description: The frame orientation in a unit quaternion representation

reference_frame.title: Reference Frame
reference_frame.description: The reference frame that the positive and orientation of the frame is defined relative to

graph.title: Graph
graph.description: Information for the graphical representation of the application

buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: A description of interactive buttons in the application graph

display_name.title: Button Display Name
display_name.description: The human-readable name to display on the button

on_click.title: On Click
on_click.description: Events that are triggered when the button is pressed

edges.title: Graph Edges
edges.description: A description of edges in the application with additional graphical information

^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.title: Graph Edge
^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.description: Additional graphical information about a specific edge in the application

path.title: Edge Path
path.description: Custom edge path coordinates as x, y pairs

position.title: Position
position.description: The position of the element on the graph

x.title: X Position
x.description: The X position of the element on the graph

y.title: Y Position
y.description: The Y position of the element on the graph

events.title: Events
events.description: A description of application events to be triggered

load.title: Load
load.description: Load a component, hardware interface or controller

oneOf.title: Load / Unload Target
oneOf.description: Identifier for a component, hardware interface or controller to load or unload

controller_identifier.title: Controller Identifier
controller_identifier.description: A controller associated with a particular hardware interface

hardware_identifier.title: Hardware Identifier
hardware_identifier.description: A hardware interface in the application

unload.title: Unload
unload.description: Unload a component, hardware interface or controller

transition.title: Transition Components
transition.description: Unload the current component and load another one
transition.$comment: The unique identifier of an application element (e.g., a component, controller, condition, or similar) formatted in lower_snake_case

set.title: Set Parameter
set.description: Set a parameter on a component

parameter.title: Parameter Name
parameter.description: The name of a parameter to set

value.title: New Parameter Value
value.description: The value of the parameter to set

payload.title: Service Payload
payload.description: The payload of the service call, formatted according to the service description

lifecycle.title: Lifecycle Event
lifecycle.description: Transition the lifecycle state on a component

lifecycle_object.title: Lifecycle Transition Object
lifecycle_object.description: A lifecycle identifier containing a transition label and target component

switch_controllers.title: Switch Controllers
switch_controllers.description: Activate or deactivate controllers on a hardware interface

switch_controllers_target.title: Target Controller
switch_controllers_target.Description: A controller or list of controllers

sequence.title: Manage Sequences
sequence.description: Start, restart or abort a sequence

restart.description: Name of the sequence to restart

abort.description: Name of the sequence to abort

start.description: Name of the sequence to start

identifier.$comment: The unique identifier of an application element (e.g., a component, controller, condition, or similar) formatted in lower_snake_case

log_level.title: Log Level
log_level.description: The log severity level for the component

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: A collection of named parameters with assigned values

^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.title: Parameter Value
^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.description: The value assigned to the named parameter

signals.title: Signals
signals.description: A map of signal topics by signal name

^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.title: Signal topic
^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.description: The corresponding topic of the signal
